data.name: Toewr le Fence
data.detailed_description:
UPDATE 4/4/2022 - The remastered version of this game is still being worked on. No, development did not stop! Join the discord server for any questions and such!

Hello everyone! I'm RMF_AndyPlayz! I am a game developer and has been working on this game for over 4 years! After 4 years of continuous coding and bug testing, I present to you "Toewr le Fence"

Here's a basic description:
(I'm trying my best to explain without spoiling!)
This is an endless tower defense-themed game where your objective is to survive as long as possible and get the highest score you can get (subject to change. I may add levels later!). In this game, some turrets and threats are replaced with memes (because that's kinda the current trend of gen-z humor).

If you have suggestions, comments, concerns, etc. please check out my website! To me, feedback = gold!

Target age group: 5-20 years old. (This is the age range where you understand memes, but this game is for you as long as you understand and like 'em!)

Anyway, this is a basic rundown because I do not want to spoilers!

data.short_description: Toewr le Fence is a memified tower defense game made by RMF_AndyPlayz! Click for more info!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: This game should be pretty lightweight. Should not be that graphics intensive

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 +
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: This game should be pretty lightweight. Should not be that graphics intensive

data.legal_notice: To keep this short, please use common sense. You are allowed to play the game, share it with friends, make videos about the game (but please link the game!), meme it, make sh1tposts, etc. I don't really care. If you really need to pirate the game, fine. Do whatever you want. But if you can, please don't to support me, my future, and any potential developers that might join. Thanks!

movies.name: Toewr le Fence: Remastered - Sneak Peek!
